Articles.Content:
Kinda funky, no?

![7dPrb85.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7dPrb85.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CnXHY6cwlc0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/g3e4dwmeu1d1vjn/Engine%206.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/g3e4dwmeu1d1vjn/Engine%206.craft?dl=0)

Hit space twice to free the axles. ***Then*** transfer the Kerbal. Then hit space to jettison the pod. Then use [ or ] until you have the front axles assembly. Hold the WASD keys to run the electric 'engine', its a bit odd so try all the keys to make the wheels spin.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T22:30:22Z" title="03/10/2015 10:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Foxster**
Amazing! I like the wheels and the overall look.

![like.jpg](http://www.deejay.it/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/like.jpg)

I mean ... don't have money or anything.

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
